channel.title: Warner Music Group on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Warner Music Group on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ADA President Cat Kreidich Leaving Warner Music
item.description: “While organizational change is a constant in our industry, I believe the foundation we’ve established will continue to serve independent artists effectively,” the exec told staff in a memo on Tuesday
